text:
I've been pretty quiet lately because I've had my head down working on WhiteBox, a tool to show you how your (compiled) code behaves as you write it (similar to Glen Chiacchieri's REPLugger, if you saw that).
I'd like some feedback on what people would like to see more of. I'm thinking about doing a livestream presentation this weekend... I might do some UI mockups to give you an idea of what I'm aiming for (and to get some criticism)
Apologies for the silence, I wanted to get something up quickly... hopefully it makes sense.
EDIT: video replaced with a version with commentary below

attachments.title: WhiteBox (REPL/live debugger) demonstration 1 - live reloading and variable values
